evidence.text: EMERGENCY MOTION for Temporary Restraining Order ., MOTION for Preliminary Injunction . Document filed by Adams and Associates, Inc., Alternate Perspectives, Inc., Education & Training Resources, LLC, National Job Corps Association, Jocelyn Rivera, Strategix Management, LLC, Transportation Communications Union/IAM. (Attachments: # 1 Proposed Order Granting Temporary Restraining Order and Order to Show Cause Why a Preliminary Injunction Should Not Issue).(Feldman, Maximillian) (Refer to ECF Rule 13.19(b) and (c) for directions regarding promptly alerting the court to this filing.) (Entered: 06/03/2025)

extracted.value: On June 3, 2025, Adams and Associates, Inc., Alternate Perspectives, Inc., Education & Training Resources, LLC, National Job Corps Association, Jocelyn Rivera, Strategix Management, LLC, and Transportation Communications Union/IAM filed an Emergency Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Preliminary Injunction, requesting the court to enjoin the Department of Labor from enforcing the elimination of the Job Corps program including stop work orders and termination notices delivered to Job Corps center operators starting May 29, 2025.

evidence.text: BRIEF re: 5 EMERGENCY MOTION for Temporary Restraining Order . MOTION for Preliminary Injunction . . Document filed by State of Washington..(Muller, Zane) (Entered: 06/13/2025)

extracted.value: On June 13, 2025, the State of Washington filed a Brief in support of the Emergency Motion for Temporary Restraining Order and Preliminary Injunction as amicus curiae, addressing the case's merits and relevant legal precedents.

evidence.text: COMPLAINT against Lori Chavez-DeRemer, Department of Labor. Document filed by Strategix Management, LLC, Adams and Associates, Inc., Transportation Communications Union/IAM, Jocelyn Rivera, Alternate Perspectives, Inc., National Job Corps Association, Education & Training Resources, LLC..(Feldman, Maximillian) (Entered: 06/03/2025)

extracted.value: On June 3, 2025, Strategix Management, LLC, Adams and Associates, Inc., Transportation Communications Union/IAM, Jocelyn Rivera, Alternate Perspectives, Inc., National Job Corps Association, and Education & Training Resources, LLC filed a Complaint against Lori Chavez-DeRemer and the Department of Labor, initiating the lawsuit and outlining the plaintiffs' claims regarding the termination of the Job Corps program.
